Study Title: Mantel Cell Lymphoma Efficacy of Rituximab Maintenance
Brief Summary: Randomized, open-label, phase III study to evaluate the efficacy of rituximab maintenance therapy in patients aged between 18 and 65 years inclusive undergoing first-line treatment for mantle cell lymphoma and exhibiting a response after autologous transplantation.
Primary Outcome Measures: event-free survival (EFS) post Rituximab maintenance therapy, EFS post 4 years after maintenance
Secondary Outcome Measures: duration of PFS of the entire group of patients., Safety/efficacy of maintenance treatment|duration of OS of the entire group of patients, safety/efficacy of treatment|complete, partial and overall response rate after induction with R-DHAP and after ASCT., safety/efficacy of all the treatment
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
